0.text: Innate: Bel'Veth attacks 36% faster than the median champion and her attack speed cap is modified to 90, but all sources of damage (including  on-hit effects) dealt by her basic attacks are reduced to 75%. Her attack speed does not increase through growth (per level).
0.html: Innate: Bel'Veth attacks 36% faster than the median champion and her attack speed cap is modified to 90, but all sources of damage (including on-hit effects) dealt by her basic attacks are reduced to 75%. Her attack speed does not increase through growth (per level).
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Innate: Bel'Veth's ability casts each generate 2 stacks of Death in Lavender, lasting for 5 seconds, refreshing on basic attacks and subsequent casts, and stacking up to 6 times. While Bel'Veth has stacks, she becomes  ghosted and gains  25% − 50% (based on level) bonus attack speed. Her basic attacks each consume 1 stack.
1.html: Innate: Bel'Veth's ability casts each generate 2 stacks of Death in Lavender, lasting for 5 seconds, refreshing on basic attacks and subsequent casts, and stacking up to 6 times. While Bel'Veth has stacks, she becomes ghosted and gains  25% − 50% (based on level) bonus attack speed. Her basic attacks each consume 1 stack.
markedPassages: ghosted
25% − 50% (based on level) bonus attack speed
25% − 50% (based on level) bonus attack speed

2.text:
Innate: Whenever Bel'Veth scores a  takedown against a  champion,  monster, or  minion within 3 seconds of damaging them, she generates a permanent stack of Lavender. Minions and monsters that are large generate 1 stack, champions and epic monsters generate 2 stacks.
Lavender: For each stack, Bel'Veth gains 0.28% − 1% (based on level) bonus attack speed.
2.html:
Innate: Whenever Bel'Veth scores a takedown against a champion, monster, or minion within 3 seconds of damaging them, she generates a permanent stack of Lavender. Minions and monsters that are large generate 1 stack, champions and epic monsters generate 2 stacks.

Lavender: For each stack, Bel'Veth gains 0.28% − 1% (based on level) bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: takedown
champion
monster
minion
0.28% − 1% (based on level) bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Bel'Veth  dashes in the designated direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through and applying  on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness to the first target hit. Void Surge can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) bonus physical damage against the first target and deals 120% damage to  monsters and modified damage against  minions.
0.html: Active: Bel'Veth dashes in the designated direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through and applying on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness to the first target hit. Void Surge can critically strike for (75% +  35%) bonus physical damage against the first target and deals 120% damage to monsters and modified damage against minions.
markedPassages: dashes
on-hit
critically strike
(75% +  35%) bonus physical damage
35%
monsters
minions

1.text: Void Surge can be cast only within a cardinal direction that is off cooldown, and incurs a cooldown between casts. Each cardinal direction has a unique  cooldown that is reduced equivalent to 0.25 ability haste per 1% bonus attack speed. These cooldowns reset upon respawning.
1.html: Void Surge can be cast only within a cardinal direction that is off cooldown, and incurs a cooldown between casts. Each cardinal direction has a unique  cooldown that is reduced equivalent to 0.25 ability haste per 1% bonus attack speed. These cooldowns reset upon respawning.
markedPassages: cooldown

2.text: Void Surge  resets Bel'Veth's basic attack timer.
2.html: Void Surge resets Bel'Veth's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Void Surge  resets Bel'Veth's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Bel'Veth slams her tail down in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit,  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds, and  slows them by 50% for a duration.
0.html: Active: Bel'Veth slams her tail down in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, knocks them up for 0.75 seconds, and slows them by 50% for a duration.
markedPassages: knocks them up
slows

1.text: If this hits an enemy  champion, it resets  Void Surge's dash  cooldown of the target direction.
1.html: If this hits an enemy champion, it resets Void Surge's dash  cooldown of the target direction.
markedPassages: champion
Void Surge's
cooldown

0.text: Active: Bel'Veth enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, during which she is unable to move, but gains  20% (+ 100% life steal) life steal and 70% damage reduction.
0.html: Active: Bel'Veth enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, during which she is unable to move, but gains  20% (+ 100% life steal) life steal and 70% damage reduction.
markedPassages: 20%

1.text: While active, she rapidly slashes at the nearest enemy with the lowest current health percentage for up to 6 (+ 1 per 33.3% bonus attack speed) times over the duration. Each slash deals physical damage, increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health), and applies  on-hit, on-attack, and spell effects at 6% − 24% (based on target's missing health) effectiveness. Royal Maelstrom deals 150% damage to  monsters, applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness, and cannot  critically strike. Bel'Veth cannot perform slashes while unable to declare basic attacks.
1.html:
While active, she rapidly slashes at the nearest enemy with the lowest current health percentage for up to 6 (+ 1 per 33.3% bonus attack speed) times over the duration. Each slash deals physical damage, increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health), and applies on-hit, on-attack, and spell effects at 6% − 24% (based on target's missing health) effectiveness.
Royal Maelstrom deals 150% damage to monsters, applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness, and cannot critically strike. Bel'Veth cannot perform slashes while unable to declare basic attacks.
markedPassages: 33.3% bonus attack speed
0% − 300% (based on target's missing health)
on-hit
6% − 24% (based on target's missing health)
monsters
life steal
critically strike

2.text: Royal Maelstrom can be recast after 0.75 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or when Bel'Veth casts an ability.
2.html: Royal Maelstrom can be recast after 0.75 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or when Bel'Veth casts an ability.

4.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.
4.html: The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.

0.text: Passive: Bel'Veth's basic attacks  on-hit apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack  on-hit against the marked target deals  bonus true damage and generates a stack of Endless Banquet that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic  monsters. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.
0.html: Passive: Bel'Veth's basic attacks on-hit apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack on-hit against the marked target deals bonus true damage and generates a stack of Endless Banquet that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic monsters. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.
markedPassages: on-hit
on-hit
monsters

1.text: Passive: When Bel'Veth scores a  takedown against an enemy  champion or epic  monster while alive, a Void Coral is spawned from their corpse for 15 seconds.  Baron Nashor and pit  Rift Herald spawn an Enhanced Void Coral.
1.html: Passive: When Bel'Veth scores a takedown against an enemy champion or epic monster while alive, a Void Coral is spawned from their corpse for 15 seconds. Baron Nashor and pit Rift Herald spawn an Enhanced Void Coral.
markedPassages: takedown
champion
monster
Baron Nashor
Rift Herald

2.text:
Active: Bel'Veth  dashes to the target Void Coral to consume it over the cast time,  slowing nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal  true damage to enemies within, capped at 1500 versus monsters, and assumes her True Form for 60 seconds.
Bel'Veth consumes all existing Void Corals at once, generating a stack of  Lavender for each one consumed.
2.html:
Active: Bel'Veth dashes to the target Void Coral to consume it over the cast time, slowing nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal  true damage to enemies within, capped at 1500 versus monsters, and assumes her True Form for 60 seconds.
Bel'Veth consumes all existing Void Corals at once, generating a stack of Lavender for each one consumed.
markedPassages: dashes
slowing
true damage
Lavender

3.text:
True Form: Bel'Veth evolves into a monster, gaining  bonus health,  bonus movement speed out-of-combat,  50 bonus attack range, as well as increased total attack speed.  Void Surge can  dash through terrain. Consuming a Void Coral refreshes the duration of True Form and  heals Bel'Veth.
Enhanced Void Coral Bonus: True Form is empowered to last 180 seconds and causes Void Remora to spawn from enemy  minions that die nearby.
3.html:
True Form: Bel'Veth evolves into a monster, gaining  bonus health,  bonus movement speed out-of-combat,  50 bonus attack range, as well as increased total attack speed. Void Surge can dash through terrain. Consuming a Void Coral refreshes the duration of True Form and heals Bel'Veth.

Enhanced Void Coral Bonus: True Form is empowered to last 180 seconds and causes Void Remora to spawn from enemy minions that die nearby.
markedPassages: bonus health
bonus movement speed
50 bonus attack range
Void Surge
dash
heals
minions

4.text: A nearby Void Coral is required to cast this ability. The  on-hit modifiers from  Death in Lavender,  Void Surge and  Royal Maelstrom affect the bonus true damage applied by Endless Banquet's passive. See Pets for details about Void Remora and Void Corals.
4.html: A nearby Void Coral is required to cast this ability. The on-hit modifiers from Death in Lavender, Void Surge and Royal Maelstrom affect the bonus true damage applied by Endless Banquet's passive. See Pets for details about Void Remora and Void Corals.

Death in Lavender

Each slash deals physical damage, increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health), and applies  on-hit, on-attack, and spell effects at 6% − 24% (based on target's missing health) effectiveness. Royal Maelstrom deals 150% damage to  monsters, applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness, and cannot  critically strike. Bel'Veth cannot perform slashes while unable to declare basic attacks.

While active, she rapidly slashes at the nearest enemy with the lowest current health percentage for up to 6 (+ 1 per 33.3% bonus attack speed) times over the duration. Each slash deals physical damage, increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health), and applies  on-hit, on-attack, and spell effects at 6% − 24% (based on target's missing health) effectiveness. Royal Maelstrom deals 150% damage to  monsters, applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness, and cannot  critically strike. Bel'Veth cannot perform slashes while unable to declare basic attacks.

textContent.text: Royal Maelstrom can be recast after 0.75 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or when Bel'Veth casts an ability.
textContent.html: Royal Maelstrom can be recast after 0.75 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or when Bel'Veth casts an ability.

textContent.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.

possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.

concerningSkills.skillName: the target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability.

textContent.text: Passive: Bel'Veth's basic attacks  on-hit apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack  on-hit against the marked target deals  bonus true damage and generates a stack of Endless Banquet that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic  monsters. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.
textContent.html: Passive: Bel'Veth's basic attacks on-hit apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack on-hit against the marked target deals bonus true damage and generates a stack of Endless Banquet that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic monsters. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.

Passive: Bel'Veth's basic attacks  on-hit apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack  on-hit against the marked target deals  bonus true damage and generates a stack of Endless Banquet that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic  monsters. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.

textContent.text: Passive: When Bel'Veth scores a  takedown against an enemy  champion or epic  monster while alive, a Void Coral is spawned from their corpse for 15 seconds.  Baron Nashor and pit  Rift Herald spawn an Enhanced Void Coral.
textContent.html: Passive: When Bel'Veth scores a takedown against an enemy champion or epic monster while alive, a Void Coral is spawned from their corpse for 15 seconds. Baron Nashor and pit Rift Herald spawn an Enhanced Void Coral.

textContent.text:
Active: Bel'Veth  dashes to the target Void Coral to consume it over the cast time,  slowing nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal  true damage to enemies within, capped at 1500 versus monsters, and assumes her True Form for 60 seconds.
Bel'Veth consumes all existing Void Corals at once, generating a stack of  Lavender for each one consumed.
textContent.html:
Active: Bel'Veth dashes to the target Void Coral to consume it over the cast time, slowing nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal  true damage to enemies within, capped at 1500 versus monsters, and assumes her True Form for 60 seconds.
Bel'Veth consumes all existing Void Corals at once, generating a stack of Lavender for each one consumed.

skillTabs.concerningText:
Active: Bel'Veth  dashes to the target Void Coral to consume it over the cast time,  slowing nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal  true damage to enemies within, capped at 1500 versus monsters, and assumes her True Form for 60 seconds.
Bel'Veth consumes all existing Void Corals at once, generating a stack of  Lavender for each one consumed.

textContent.text:
True Form: Bel'Veth evolves into a monster, gaining  bonus health,  bonus movement speed out-of-combat,  50 bonus attack range, as well as increased total attack speed.  Void Surge can  dash through terrain. Consuming a Void Coral refreshes the duration of True Form and  heals Bel'Veth.
Enhanced Void Coral Bonus: True Form is empowered to last 180 seconds and causes Void Remora to spawn from enemy  minions that die nearby.
textContent.html:
True Form: Bel'Veth evolves into a monster, gaining  bonus health,  bonus movement speed out-of-combat,  50 bonus attack range, as well as increased total attack speed. Void Surge can dash through terrain. Consuming a Void Coral refreshes the duration of True Form and heals Bel'Veth.

Enhanced Void Coral Bonus: True Form is empowered to last 180 seconds and causes Void Remora to spawn from enemy minions that die nearby.

textContent.text: A nearby Void Coral is required to cast this ability. The  on-hit modifiers from  Death in Lavender,  Void Surge and  Royal Maelstrom affect the bonus true damage applied by Endless Banquet's passive. See Pets for details about Void Remora and Void Corals.

concerningSkills.skillName: a nearby void coral is required to cast this ability. the on-hit modifiers from death in lavender, void surge and royal maelstrom affect the bonus true damage applied by endless banquet's passive. see pets for details about void remora and void corals.

1.concerningText: Active: Bel'Veth  dashes in the designated direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through and applying  on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness to the first target hit. Void Surge can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) bonus physical damage against the first target and deals 120% damage to  monsters and modified damage against  minions.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks ( on-hit / on-attack) grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks ( on-hit /  on-attack) grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% / 9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 103 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (30 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% /  9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on  shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
